snippet: Pakistani military officials said the Indian military had killed a civilian, the latest in a round of accusations of cross-border violations in the disputed region of Kashmir.
abstract: Pakistani military officials say Indian military killed a civilian, latest incident in a round of accusations of cross-border violations in disputed Kashmir region, which the two countries claim in its entirety.
lead_paragraph: Pakistani military officials said the Indian military had killed a civilian, the latest in a round of accusations of cross-border violations in the disputed region of Kashmir.

headline.main: Pakistan Says Indian Military Killed a Civilian in Kashmir
headline.print_headline: Pakistan Says Indians Killed a Civilian in Kashmir
